review_blob: Hay, citrus decent brew. I liked the structure of it and the after taste, slightly woody.
Honey color. Nose is nice and mellow but wish it had a bit more. Crisp and clean taste with a slight bitter. Very drinkable on a hot day. Refreshing.
Toast, roasty much better from the draft than from the bottle.  Flavorful. Slightly nutty and a bit bitter depending on bottle or tap oddly enough.
Was decent but not a huge fan of IPA unless its good. Nothing special really. Its got a bit of hop standard for an IPA, it does have a bit of bitter aftertaste.
